name: #RR00
description:
#RR00 is an early prototype of an idea i have. It's a 2d-topdown shooter where times moves when you move. I'm currently looking for feedback to decide on what's best for the game mechanics and gameplay. If you would like to help me develop it make sure to leave a comment below providing your feedback.

If you want to contact me, you can do so on twitter:@mc_minebill and on discord:MineBill#7013

  • Controls: 
    • AWSD to move around.
    • Mouse to shoot.
  • The twist:
    • Time moves really really slow but speeds up when you move your mouse or your character.

Update 0.8

  • Added some background music.
  • Added some visual stuff to let the player know when he can fire again.
  • The sound effects change pitch based on the time.
  • Changed some colors.
  • I think that's it.
